TEXT.English: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.French: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.German: Karten können nicht mit Hilfe des Handelsbildschirms gehandelt werden
TEXT.Italian: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.Spanish: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible

TEXT.English: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.French: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.German: Städte können nicht mit Hilfe des Handelsbildschirms gehandelt werden
TEXT.Italian: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.Spanish: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible

TEXT.English: No resource modifier for world wonders
TEXT.French: No resource modifier for world wonders
TEXT.Italian: No resource modifier for world wonders
TEXT.Spanish: No resource modifier for world wonders

TEXT.English: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
TEXT.French: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
TEXT.German: Weltwunder können nicht mehr mit Hilfe von Resourcen beschleunigt werden
TEXT.Italian: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
TEXT.Spanish: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources

TEXT.English: Peace Treaties cannot be signed until 5 turns after war declaration unless a city has been captured by one of the two parties.
TEXT.French: Peace Treaties cannot be signed until 5 turns after war declaration unless a city has been captured by one of the two parties.
TEXT.German: Friedensvertrï¿½ge kï¿½nnen erst 5 Runden nach Kriegsbeginn verhandelt werden oder nachdem eine Stadt einer der beiden Parteien erobert wurde.
TEXT.Italian: Peace Treaties cannot be signed until 5 turns after war declaration unless a city has been captured by one of the two parties.
TEXT.Spanish: Peace Treaties cannot be signed until 5 turns after war declaration unless a city has been captured by one of the two parties.

TEXT.English: Players can trade the same items with humans as with AI
TEXT.French: Players can trade the same items with humans as with AI
TEXT.German: Spieler kï¿½nnen mit Menschen die gleichen Objekte verhandeln wie mit der KI
TEXT.Italian: Players can trade the same items with humans as with AI
TEXT.Spanish: Players can trade the same items with humans as with AI

TEXT.English: The Werkstatt is a German forge that also lowers the city maintanence cost
TEXT.French: The Werkstatt is a German forge that also lowers the city maintanence cost
TEXT.German: The Werkstatt is a German forge that also lowers the city maintanence cost
TEXT.Italian: The Werkstatt is a German forge that also lowers the city maintanence cost
TEXT.Spanish: The Werkstatt is a German forge that also lowers the city maintanence cost

TEXT.English: The Nanban Harbour is a Japanese harbour that provides experience to specific unit types.
TEXT.French: The Nanban Harbour is a Japanese harbour that provides experience to specific unit types.
TEXT.German: The Nanban Harbour is a Japanese harbour that provides experience to specific unit types.
TEXT.Italian: The Nanban Harbour is a Japanese harbour that provides experience to specific unit types.
TEXT.Spanish: The Nanban Harbour is a Japanese harbour that provides experience to specific unit types.

TEXT.English: The Tracker is a scout replacement that can also built Totem poles.
TEXT.French: The Tracker is a scout replacement that can also built Totem poles.
TEXT.German: The Tracker is a scout replacement that can also built Totem poles.
TEXT.Italian: The Tracker is a scout replacement that can also built Totem poles.
TEXT.Spanish: The Tracker is a scout replacement that can also built Totem poles.

TEXT.English: The Stosstrupp is the german replacement for the grenadier, and is more powerful.
TEXT.French: The Stosstrupp is the german replacement for the grenadier, and is more powerful.
TEXT.German: The Stosstrupp is the german replacement for the grenadier, and is more powerful.
TEXT.Italian: The Stosstrupp is the german replacement for the grenadier, and is more powerful.
TEXT.Spanish: The Stosstrupp is the german replacement for the grenadier, and is more powerful.

TEXT.English: The Satrap Court is the Persian replacement for the Market, which gives helps reduce city maintenance within the city it is built.
TEXT.French: The Satrap Court is the Persian replacement for the Market, which gives helps reduce city maintenance within the city it is built.
TEXT.German: The Satrap Court is the Persian replacement for the Market, which gives helps reduce city maintenance within the city it is built.
TEXT.Italian: The Satrap Court is the Persian replacement for the Market, which gives helps reduce city maintenance within the city it is built.
TEXT.Spanish: The Satrap Court is the Persian replacement for the Market, which gives helps reduce city maintenance within the city it is built.

TEXT.English: The Indian Harappan Granary is a granary that gives extra happiness and health.
TEXT.French: The Indian Harappan Granary is a granary that gives extra happiness and health.
TEXT.German: The Indian Harappan Granary is a granary that gives extra happiness and health.
TEXT.Italian: The Indian Harappan Granary is a granary that gives extra happiness and health.
TEXT.Spanish: The Indian Harappan Granary is a granary that gives extra happiness and health.

TEXT.English: The Byzantine COunterweight Trebuchet is a stronger trebuchet that is stronger in field combat than the basic catapult.
TEXT.French: The Byzantine COunterweight Trebuchet is a stronger trebuchet that is stronger in field combat than the basic catapult.
TEXT.German: The Byzantine COunterweight Trebuchet is a stronger trebuchet that is stronger in field combat than the basic catapult.
TEXT.Italian: The Byzantine COunterweight Trebuchet is a stronger trebuchet that is stronger in field combat than the basic catapult.
TEXT.Spanish: The Byzantine COunterweight Trebuchet is a stronger trebuchet that is stronger in field combat than the basic catapult.

TEXT.English: Melee units built in Armouries will always have access to two promotions! And if combined with the Charismatic trait, so will tanks, gunpowder and mounted units without any other factors!
TEXT.French: Melee units built in Armouries will always have access to two promotions! And if combined with the Charismatic trait, so will tanks, gunpowder and mounted units without any other factors!
TEXT.German: Melee units built in Armouries will always have access to two promotions! And if combined with the Charismatic trait, so will tanks, gunpowder and mounted units without any other factors!
TEXT.Italian: Melee units built in Armouries will always have access to two promotions! And if combined with the Charismatic trait, so will tanks, gunpowder and mounted units without any other factors!
TEXT.Spanish: Melee units built in Armouries will always have access to two promotions! And if combined with the Charismatic trait, so will tanks, gunpowder and mounted units without any other factors!
